entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain early this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
